alert.note: Alert for Burleson; Washington (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 21 at 7:39PM CDT until March 21 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Burleson County in southeastern Texas... Northwestern Washington County in southeastern Texas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 739 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Giddings, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Lake Somerville State Park & Trailway around 750 PM CDT. Somerville around 805 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Lyons and Deanville. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
